minecraft:written_book_content.title: Knowledge
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages:
{"text":"They have outposts across the world. They have great mansions hidden in the depths of the forests. They have a great Citadel, in lands far away.

They hold the last remains of forgotten knowledge. They know of the Strongholds. They know of the"}

{"text":"Libraries. They know of the Portals. 

What else are they hiding?"}
